name: Final Blade (itch)
description:
An old school JRPG style game for the Bruised Egos game jam.

Play as Haver, your average protagonist as he finds himself taking part in a brand new adventure, or at least the start of one.

Controller is recommended.

Controls:

kb&m:

Movement:WASD
Interacting: E
Return: Q
Menu: Tab

Controller(Xbox):

Movement: Dpad
Interact: A
Return: B
Menu: Y
